== ChrisHalls ==

== Chris Halls ==

Kubuntu leader and Ubuntu maintainer.  Debian Open''''''Office.org maintainer and core developer.  
Managing director of <nowiki>[[http://www.credativ.co.uk/|Credativ Ltd]]</nowiki>.

=== [Kubuntu] ===

[Kubuntu] is to KDE what Ubuntu is to Gnome.  We are working on Kubuntu to release with KDE 3.4 around the same time as Ubuntu Hoary.

=== OpenOffice.org ===

After starting off simply offering to build OO''''''o  on i386, I managed to end up becoming the packager that brought OO''''''o  to Debian.  Now I maintain the  packages for Debian together with Rene Engelhard, and am working on getting the upcoming version 2.0 in shape for release in 2005.
